'''Devastation and Redemption''' is a soundtrack from the EP album ''Fleeting Colors in Flight (Album)''.

The song was composed by Yu-Peng Chen and arranged by Dimeng Yuan of [[HOYO-MiX]], and written by Dou of the Creative Concept and Writing Team.<ref name="cloud-music">NetEase Cloud Music: [https://music.163.com/#/song?id=1910911958 神女劈观·唤情 Devastation and Redemption]</ref> The vocals were performed by Yang Yang ({{Lang|zh=杨扬|mini=1}}) of the Shanghai Jingju Theatre Company.

The soundtrack was featured in an animated cutscene from the [[Archon Quest]] ''[[Where the Heart Finds Rest]].'' The scene is referred to as "The Divine Damsel of Devastation."
__TOC__

==Lyrics==
The performance of "The Divine Damsel of Devastation" is entirely in Chinese for all voice-over languages. The original transcript is shown below.

! Chinese Transcript !! Pinyin !! English Transcript<!-- !! Translation-->
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=可⸺叹⸺}} || ''Kě&mdash; tàn&mdash;'' || Alas!
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=秋鸿折单复难双}} || ''Qiū hóng zhé dān fù nán shuāng'' || Two loving souls by death cruelly parted
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=痴人痴怨恨迷狂}} || ''Chī rén chī yuàn hèn mí kuáng'' || In madness and grief, a dark path started
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=只因那邪牲祭伏定祸殃}} || ''Zhǐ yīn nà xié shēngjì fú dìng huòyāng'' || Calamity was drawn, rituals subverted
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=若非巾帼拔剑人皆命丧}} || ''Ruòfēi jīn'guó bá jiàn rén jiē mìng sàng'' || But by her cold steel was death averted
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=凡缘朦朦仙缘滔}} || ''Fán yuán méngméng xiānyuán tāo'' || Mortal ties broken, with the adepti she went
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=天伦散去绛府邀}} || ''Tiānlún sànqù jiàngfǔ yāo'' || Their abiding place filling paternal bonds rent
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=朱丝缚绝烂柯樵}} || ''Zhūsī fùjué lànkēqiáo'' || To her red strings of binding they sent
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=雪泥鸿迹遥}} || ''Xuě ní hóng jī yáo'' || And they dwelt long together, content
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=鹤归不见昔华表}} || ''Hè guī bùjiàn xī huábiǎo'' || The crane returned to a home without luster
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=蛛丝枉结魂幡飘}} || ''Zhūsī wǎngjié húnfān piāo'' || The cobwebs overgrown, the grave-shrouds a-fluster
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=因果红尘渺渺}} || ''Yīn'guǒ hóngchén miǎomiǎo'' || But one bond upon her
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=烟消}} || ''Yān xiāo'' || This world could not muster
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=《神女劈观》到这里本该接近尾声}} || ''"Shénnǚ Pīguān" dào zhèlǐ běn gāi jiējìn wěishēng'' || Thus does the Divine Damsel's tale duly end
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=但今日我再添一笔⸺}} || ''Dàn jīnrì wǒ zài tiān yī bǐ&mdash;'' || But today a new tale I have to append
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=唱与⸺诸位⸺听⸺}} || ''Chàng yǔ&mdash; zhūwèi&mdash; tīng&mdash;'' || Which I shall now tell — if you shall attend
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=曲高未必人不识}} || ''Qǔ gāo wèibì rén bù shí'' || From the world she seems apart
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=自有知音和清词}} || ''Zì yǒu zhīyīn hè qīngcí'' || But there are those who know her heart
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=红缨猎猎剑流星}} || ''Hóngyīng lièliè jiàn liúxīng'' || With crimson spear and flashing brand
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=直指怒潮洗海清}} || ''Zhízhǐ nùcháo xǐ hǎi qīng'' || To still the raging tides they stand
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=彼时鹤归}} || ''Bǐshí hè guī'' || The crane once returned
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=茫茫天地无依靠}} || ''Mángmáng tiāndì wú yīkào'' || And once, she was spurned
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=孤身离去}} || ''Gūshēn lí qù'' || She turned, and left alone
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=今日再会}} || ''Jīnrì zàihuì'' || Now, she might be found
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=新朋旧友坐满堂}} || ''Xīnpéng jiùyǒu zuò mǎntáng'' || With friends all around
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=共聚此时}} || ''Gòngjù cǐshí'' || To whom she is bound — a home
